title: X is Y (wa/desu)
description: The topic marker 'wa' and the copula 'desu'.
explanation: In Japanese, the particle 'wa' (written as は) marks the topic of the sentence. 'Desu' (です) acts like 'is/am/are'.

exercises.question: Fill in the particle: Watashi _ gakusei desu

title: Possessive Particle (no)
explanation: The particle 'no' (の) connects two nouns, where the first modifies the second. It often works like 's in English.

exercises.question: Fill in the particle: Watashi _ hon
